task.summary:
Add assets for Roman history
This commit adds the following assets: - colosseum.png - forum.png - trophy.png - caesar.png - rivoluzione.png - costantino.jpg - appia.jpg - lupo.jpg - venere.jpg - gladiator.jpg - lingua.png - tevere.jpg - augusto.jpg
These assets will be used to enhance the user experience and provide visual context for the Roman history content.

Add Roman Empire and French Revolution quiz data
This commit introduces two new lists of `QuizQuestion` objects: - `romanEmpireQuestions`: Contains questions related to the Roman Empire. - `frenchRevolutionQuestions`: Contains questions related to the French Revolution.
Each question includes the question text, a list of possible answers, the index of the correct answer, and an optional image path.

Create QuizIntroScreen
This commit introduces the `QuizIntroScreen` widget, which serves as an introductory screen before starting a quiz.
Key features: - Displays the quiz title, description, and an associated image dynamically. - Provides an "Inizia il Quiz!" button to navigate to the `QuizScreen`. - Implements an exit confirmation dialog when the back button is pressed. - Includes a bottom navigation bar with "Home", "Conversazioni", and "Impostazioni" items. - "Home" navigates back to the `QuizSelectionScreen`. - "Conversazioni" and "Impostazioni" are placeholders for future functionality. - The design aims for a clean and user-friendly interface.

Create quiz models
This commit introduces two new classes: `QuizQuestion` and `QuizResult`.
The `QuizQuestion` class represents a single quiz question and includes: - The question text (`question`) - A list of possible answers (`answers`) - The index of the correct answer (`correctAnswerIndex`) - An optional image path (`imagePath`)
The `QuizResult` class stores the results of a quiz and includes: - The number of correct answers (`correctAnswers`) - The number of incorrect answers (`incorrectAnswers`) - The total number of questions (`totalQuestions`) - A list of the user's answers (`userAnswers`) - A list of the correct answer indices (`correctAnswerIndices`)

Create quiz results screen
This commit introduces a new `QuizResultsScreen` widget that displays the results of a completed quiz.
The screen shows: - A "Quiz completato!" message. - Motivational text. - Statistics for correct and incorrect answers. - A trophy image. - A button to return to the quiz selection screen. - A bottom navigation bar with "Home", "Conversazioni", and "Impostazioni" options.
The `onQuizCompleted` callback is triggered when the user navigates back to the quiz selection screen.

Create quiz_runner.dart
This commit creates the `quiz_runner.dart` file.
This file defines the main application widget `QuizApp`, which sets up the MaterialApp with a title, theme, initial route, and routes. It also imports the `QuizSelectionScreen` and sets it as the initial route.

Create QuizScreen with enhanced UI and feedback
This commit introduces the `QuizScreen` widget, which handles the quiz-taking experience.
Key features include: - Display of questions with optional images. - Multiple-choice answers with visual feedback for selected, correct, and incorrect options. - Progress bar and question counter. - "Controlla" (Check) button to verify the answer and "Avanti" (Next) button to proceed. - Exit confirmation dialog. - Navigation to `QuizResultsScreen` upon quiz completion. - Callback functions `onQuizCompleted` and `onQuizExited` to notify parent widgets.
The UI has been styled with rounded corners, shadows, and color-coded feedback for a more engaging user experience.

Create QuizSelectionScreen
This commit introduces a new screen, `QuizSelectionScreen`, which allows users to select a historical period for a quiz.
The screen displays a list of available quizzes as cards, each with a title and an image. Tapping on a card navigates to the `QuizIntroScreen` for the selected quiz.
The screen also includes a bottom navigation bar for navigating between Home, Conversations, and Settings (currently implemented with placeholder SnackBars for Conversations and Settings).
Key features: - Displays a list of quiz options. - Navigates to the `QuizIntroScreen` upon selection. - Includes a bottom navigation bar. - Implements a method to return to the quiz selection screen after quiz completion or exit.

Create QuizWidget
This commit introduces the `QuizWidget` class, which serves as an entry point for the quiz functionality.
The `QuizWidget`: - Takes optional `onQuizCompleted` and `onQuizExited` callbacks to notify the parent application about the quiz flow's state. - Directly displays the `QuizIntroScreen`. - Passes the quiz data (`romanEmpireQuestions`) and the callbacks to the `QuizIntroScreen`.
Navigation within the quiz (Intro -> Quiz -> Results) is managed by pushing `MaterialPageRoute` instances.

Add new assets and IDEA project files
This commit introduces several new image assets: - appia.jpg - augusto.jpg - costantino.jpg - gladiator.jpg - lingua.png - lupo.jpg - tevere.jpg - venere.jpg
Additionally, this commit adds IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files: - .idea/.gitignore - .idea/libraries/Dart_Packages.xml - .idea/libraries/Dart_SDK.xml - .idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml - .idea/Gruppo-1-IUM-2024-2025.iml - .idea/misc.xml - .idea/modules.xml - .idea/vcs.xml
